Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Negative Bacterial Infections/Rickettsiaceae Infections/Rickettsia Infections/Typhus, Endemic Flea-Borne
Record.Description: An infectious disease clinically similar to epidemic louse-borne typhus (TYPHUS, EPIDEMIC LOUSE-BORNE), but caused by RICKETTSIA TYPHI, which is transmitted from rat to man by the rat flea, Xenopsylla cheopis.
